trans-unit.target: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA3GUIDE2_00518_OPERATOR00510_000_000<tab>We're in Pyros, aye? You'll forgive me for expecting it to be a mite warmer. Bloody frustrating it is, having to dig into this damn permafrost...

TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA3GUIDE2_00518_OPERATOR00510_000_010<tab>Bugger me, that quake was something else. Spent a good while after going round the buildings and checking for damage. I'll be damned if I'm gonna die buried beneath frozen timbers I helped put up myself!

TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA3GUIDE2_00518_OPERATOR00510_000_020<tab>If you're looking for answers as to what in the hells is going on, you'd best look somewhere else. I'm no scholar, in case you haven't noticed. More practical matters like making sure people have places to lay their heads and whatnot are my concern.
